title: Pixel 4a only vibrates (i.e. no ringtone) for calls from starred contacts, even with Nov 2020 update
content:
Hi everyone, I was pretty excited when I read of the patch notes for the november 2020 patch.

However, my Pixel 4a still only vibrates for calls from starred contacts. There is no ringtone, although I am using the standard options for DND mode and ringing is activated.

If you have a 4a, does it work for you?
Are there special options I have to consider?
